com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.model

Class OdpAuthorizationStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.model.OdpAuthorizationStep

  • public class OdpAuthorizationStep
extends Object
    Represents a single authorization step in an ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) workflow. Each step records whether the ODP was authorized or rejected, the user who performed the action, and any associated notes.
    Author:
    Claude Code

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OdpAuthorizationStep(boolean authorized, OdpUser user, Date date, String notes)
      Constructs an authorization step with the specified details.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Date getDate()
      Returns the date and time when the authorization action was performed.
      String getNotes()
      Returns the notes or comments associated with this authorization step.
      OdpUser getUser()
      Returns the user who performed this authorization action.
      boolean isAuthorized()
      Returns whether this step represents an authorization (approval).

    • Constructor Detail

      • OdpAuthorizationStep

        public OdpAuthorizationStep(boolean authorized,
                            OdpUser user,
                            Date date,
                            String notes)
        Constructs an authorization step with the specified details.
        Parameters:
        authorized - true if the ODP was authorized, false if rejected
        user - the user who performed the authorization action
        date - the date and time when the authorization action was performed
        notes - optional notes or comments for this authorization step

    • Method Detail

      • isAuthorized

        public boolean isAuthorized()
        Returns whether this step represents an authorization (approval).
        Returns:
        true if authorized, false if rejected

        Returns the user who performed this authorization action.
